column5: The two-year Master’s in Applied Physics is an internationally oriented programme and is taught entirely in English. The programme starts in September and February. The pre-master's programme starts in September.Discover more about the Master’s in Applied Physics at the University of Twente or our pre-master’s. Check out the study programme and the admission requirements.We also offer a Bachelor's in (BSc) in Applied Physics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
